snippet: Pirates off the coast of Nigeria and Cameroon attacked a ship and kidnapped three sailors in the increasingly dangerous waters of the Gulf of Guinea, officials said Friday.
lead_paragraph: Pirates off the coast of Nigeria and Cameroon attacked a ship and kidnapped three sailors in the increasingly dangerous waters of the Gulf of Guinea, officials said Friday.

headline.main: Nigeria: Pirates Kidnap 3 Sailors Off Coast
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Pirates Kidnap 3 Sailors Off Coast
